mdRecord.dcterms:description: Line from song "All You Need is Love," by the Beatles, with various responses, including one in the previous image ("i'd prefer sex"). A Bible verse citation (without the actual text of the verse). [work]
Student graffiti art and messages inscribed on carrel walls in the new stacks, Alderman Library, University of Virginia, prior to the renovation of the building, 2020-2023. [host]
